question: Which global institution has inked deal with Reliance Power for constructing power plant in Bangladesh?
explanation:
The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has signed a USD 200 million deal with the Reliance Bangladesh LNG and Power Limited (RBLPL).
Under the deal, Reliance power would build and operate a 718-megawatt combined-cycle power plant in Bangladesh. USD 100 million would be provided by the ADB while the other 100 million would be sourced from the Leading Asiaâ€™s Private Infrastructure Fund (LEAP) of Japan International Cooperation Agency.
